# yumekawa-utils
Blockchain Utility Collection for Sugarchain

## max_money
![](https://github.com/sugarchain-project/yumekawa-utils/blob/master/max_money/max_money.png)

 - depends
```bash
sudo apt-get install gnuplot && \
pip install numpy
```

 - run
```bash
cd max_money && \
./max_money.py && \
cat max_money.csv && \
gnuplot max_money.plot && \
cd
```

 - data
